summary: Cute Competition Characters: Florist!Bucky Barnes x Florist!Reader Word Count: 995 Warnings: Nothing Rating: Fluff Summary:...
body:
Cute Competition

Characters: Florist!Bucky Barnes x Florist!Reader

Word Count: 995

Warnings: Nothing

Rating: Fluff

Summary: requested by the amazing @spiderman-slut

“hey me again lol could I request bucky and reader being florists in stores across the street from each other and they’re both really competitive so they send each other increasingly extravagant bouquets until they start sending notes about how cute the other looks and stuff until one finally asks the other out”

Abbreviations:

Y/N=Your Name

Y/L/N= Your Last Name

gif: found on google

-

-

You remember one of the best arrangements. Red roses with Madonna lilies. Damn, it was beautiful. You felt your cheeks turn red until you heard a door open behind you. Across the street stood your competitor, leaning against his door. You nodded and said to yourself. “Nice one, Barnes.” This was just the beginning to your own cheesy love story.

You were one of the best florists in the city. You sold all kinds of flowers. Roses, daisies, sunflowers, name it. You also sold them at an affordable price. You had lived above the flower shop. People who lived nearby had known you as long as you lived there. You had seen the usual flower truck that dropped off your flowers across the street. You noticed a new face taking the flowers out of the back of the truck. You walked over and looked at the driver. “Hey, my store is over there. “ The driver nods and looks at you. “Yeah, and your next shipment isn’t until Friday. I’m shipping to him.” He pointed to the man walking out of the store. He was wearing a white hoodie and had his brunette hair pulled up, strands hanging in front of his eyes. “Hi, I’m Y/N. I own the flower shop across the road.” He looks past you, checking out his new competition. He smiled and shook your hand. “I’m James, but you can call me Bucky.” 

He wasn’t new to the city. He apparently had lived in Brooklyn when he was younger. You saw a fall in your customers. Luckily the usuals still showed up. One of your customers being an older woman who constantly tried to set you up with someone. One day, when you were getting her change, she looked at Bucky’s shop. “Ya know, the Barnes is a very handsome man.” You nod, agreeing with her. “Would you ever date him?” You blushed. “Ma’am, he’s my ‘competition’.” She waved her hand at you. “A young person like you should be out dating. Your children would be adorable.” Your face turned as red as the roses the women held. You could barely speak.

You had to admit that he was awfully cute. But you had no time to date, you were running a business after all.

On Valentine’s day, you were so busy. Thankfully you were able to leave the shop early enough to buy a coffee and come back before people were rushing to buy roses. It was days like this that you wish you could have some kind of relationship. You noticed a small bouquet of roses sitting on the steps of the shop. You looked around, seeing who had left it. You saw Bucky standing by his front windows, smiling. You turned into your store and shook your head. 

The following day you walked to his store, placing a bouquet of violets and primrose on the stoop. You watched from the window of your store. He walked outside, glancing at the flowers and smiling brightly. His hair was pulled back into a very messy bun. He glanced at your store and smiled, waving at you. You waved back and smiled.

This continued on for another month. Except they go more and more extravagant. And as time went on you started to feel something for the cute florist. You woke up one morning and quickly rushed to the steps, he had left a small wooden vase, it had multicolored tulips. This time something was different, he had left a note. You read the note. 

“you looked really pretty with all those tulips yesterday :)”

His handwriting was messy but still beautiful. You quickly made an arrangement of your blue flowers and wrote a note. 

“these flowers are almost as pretty as your eyes”

Bucky had some of the most beautiful eyes you had ever seen. They sparkled when he spoke of his passions. You two spoke but never mentioned the bouquets, even though you knew it was each other. At your desk, you had a small box filled with his notes. 

“you looked really nice in that hoodie” accompanied by marigolds.

“these sunflowers aren’t nearly as bright as your smile” accompanied by a bouquet of sunflowers.

“your laugh is adorable holy shit” accompanied by carnations

You had woken up early one morning. You heard the rain hitting the cars outside as they sped down the nearly empty road. You made yourself tea and started to make your next arrangement. You grabbed the flowers and began to arrange them in a pattern. You started to practice what you were going to write on the card. Everything you said out loud sounded creepy or not cute. You sighed and took a sip of your tea. You heard someone knock on the door. You didn’t bother to check who it was. “I’m closed until 11, sorry! If you’d like an arrangement today, call the number on the door. Have a nice day!” You continued to work on the arrangement when the phone rang. You stopped and picked it up. “Hello, my name is Y/N Y/L/N. Can I make a flowe-”

“Y/N, doll, it’s me. Open the door please, I’m getting soaked.” You turned around quickly to see Bucky standing there. You quickly ran over, opening the door. He stepped in the store and looked you up and down. You were dressed in a hoodie and sweatpants. He smiles at you, one hand behind his back. He holds a single rose in front of him. “Esti atat de frumosa.” He chuckled when your face turned puzzled. “I said you’re so beautiful.” You turned red and smiled brightly. “Thank you, James. “ You moved to put the rose into a vase. You noticed him staring at the pile of flowers you had left on the counter. “Were you trying to one-up me?” You chuckled and nod. He reaches for your hand.

 “Let’s cut this cutesy shit. Do you wanna go on a date?”

-

i’m so sorry this took so long! I was really busy or it kept getting deleted! I hope you guys like it.

blog.name: mangajuicexd
blog.title: Manga Juice xD
blog.description:
Liz, 20y/o, Space Alien Cat who knows German and is now residing in the North. I dont know why I ship my ships, but one thing is for certain, I ship them because the chemistry is so strong.
character chemistry > moral implications. For now, I am madly and deeply infatuated with Mr. Tom Hiddleston, and I just wish him happiness.

title: Black Panther Faces Off Against…Deadpool?!
body:
Black Panther vs. Deadpool comes to comic shops this October!

Deadpool has gone up against almost everyone in the Marvel Universe…and now, that roster includes the legendary Black Panther in BLACK PANTHER VS. DEADPOOL, a new story from Lockjaw and The Late Show with Stephen Colbert writer Daniel Kibblesmith and artist Ricardo Lopez Ortiz (Hit-Girl, Civil War II: Kingpin).

For a reason he’d…

tags: thank yous all for your support it makes me V HAPPY!!!
summary: Confines of Fear - Chapter 1 - ellasimone - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: Confines of Fear - Chapter 1 - ellasimone - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/2
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Relationships: Bruce Banner/Thor

summary: Cheap Marvel Movies. I repeat, cheap Marvel Movies.
body:
Cheap Marvel Movies. I repeat, cheap Marvel Movies.

iTunes has a bunch of the Marvel movies on for about 13$ for this weekend only!!!! The list has the Iron Man trinity, Ant Man, The First Avenger, The Avengers, Spider-Man Homecoming, Thor:The Dark World, Guardians of the Galaxy, and Dr. Strange. It is on for this weekend only, get them while you can!!!!

summary: Thanos rly didn’t have to b sympathetic he’s killed so many ppl and abused Gamora and Nebula for years? Like it’s ok to go for...
body: Thanos rly didn’t have to b sympathetic he’s killed so many ppl and abused Gamora and Nebula for years? Like it’s ok to go for *layers* or whatever but also ppl just like dumb camp it’s why we love Loki bc he’s a melodramatic bottom like no one is losing sleep over the fact that Hela the Goth Imperialist and Goddess of Death didn’t idk, shed a single dramatic tear abt kicking her two brothers asses and pushin em out the bifrost so why is this purple thumb any different

summary: EXILES #5 TIME TO DIE! The identity of the Time-Eater has finally been revealed! And the Exiles have nowhere left to run. It's...
caption:
EXILES #5

TIME TO DIE!
The identity of the Time-Eater has finally been revealed! And the Exiles have nowhere left to run. It’s time for the Exiles to face down their enemy - no matter the cost. And in historic Exiles fashion, not everyone will survive. Don’t miss the first arc’s epic conclusion!

Available at Lobo Comics & Toys this coming Wednesday, 07/11/2018

visit us on facebook, google+, blogspot, our eBay store, and our website

summary: The list of my favourite marvel characters:
body:
The list of my favourite marvel characters:

  1. Every character
  2. Has its own
  3. Uniqueness
  4. They are all powerful
  5. And independent beauties
  6. They don’t need to be
  7. Listed
  8. They should be
  9. Appreciated
  10. And loved

tags: and i think peyton reed took what ppl loved from scotts role in cw and used a lot of it in amatw
summary:
i don't think the first antman was necessarily bad, more than anything the first one had to do a LOT of world building
they had...
body:
i don’t think the first antman was necessarily bad, more than anything the first one had to do a LOT of world building

they had to establish hank pyms relationship w other scientists, pym particles, the quantum realm and everything that happened w janet

w so much world building going on there wasn’t all that much time to focus on plot and actual funny and entertaining development

which is why scott’s role in civil war is one of the highlights of the film bc they were able to focus on scott’s character and humor

blog.name: super-hero-confessions
blog.title: Super-Hero-Confessions
blog.description:
Super-hero-confessions is a blog where you can submit your confessions/personal opinions about any of the super hero movies, comics, television shows, cartoons, etc.

The confessions that are posted are those that are submitted; not the opinions of the blog owners. All the confessions will be anonymous when posted. Feel free to submit photos along with your confession if you would like as well.

If you want us to see a post tag it with either #superheroconfessions or #superhero confessions
